name: The Bart Simpson Quiz #1 | 'Simpsons' - Characters | 10 Questions

questions.text: Everyone knows Bart got a tattoo on the first Christmas episode, but what did it end up saying?
questions.explanation:
Moth.

	The tattoo was supposed to be a heart with Mother written on it, but Marge caught Bart in the act, and it said "Moth".  Unfinished, Marge drags Bart off to get it removed.  She ends up spending all of the Christmas funds.

questions.text: In the episode "Dead Putting Society", Bart faces off against Rodd Flanders in a game of Miniature Golf.
questions.explanation:
False.

	This is a bit tricky.  Bart actually faces off with Todd Flanders in the tournament.  The tournament ended in a draw, and Homer and Ned had to mow each other's lawns in their wives' church dresses.

questions.text: After following in the footsteps of daredevil Lance Murdock, Bart decides to jump Springfield Gorge with what?
questions.explanation:
His skateboard.

	Bart becomes a daredevil by jumping over many things including cars and pets, and decides to jump Springfield Gorge.  Homer has to prove how wrong it is by jumping the gorge himself.

questions.text: In "Three Men and a Comic Book", Bart, along with Milhouse and Martin, purchase a Radioactive Man comic book.  What number was it?
questions.explanation:
One.

	Comic Book Guy sells the very first Radioactive Man Comic book for $100 to Martin, Bart, and Milhouse who fight over the comic until it is struck by lightning, and ripped up by the dog.

OO-.

	This is discovered when Homer gives some of Bart's blood to his boss, Mr. Burns.  Homer becomes disappointed after Mr. Burns doesn't give the Simpsons a gift in return.

questions.text: When Bart stumbles upon Fat Tony's mob, he makes the gang what kind of drink?
questions.explanation:
Manhattan.

	Bart becomes the mob's bartender until Principal Skinner becomes missing, and the mob is to blame.  In court, the mob turns against Bart, and he is about to be sentenced when Principal Skinner interrupts.

questions.text: What is Bart building in "Saturdays of Thunder" that he and Homer name "Lil' Lightning"?
questions.explanation:
A Soap Box Derby Racer.

	The racer is a hunk of junk, so Bart drives Martin's car after Martin breaks his arm and is unable to drive.  Bart wins the derby.

questions.text: Homer gives Bart a Superstar Celebrity Microphone on his birthday, and Bart falls down the well after playing a prank.  What singer/songwriter helps the Simpsons save Bart?
questions.explanation:
Sting.

	Though he plays a minor role in the episode, Sting is the first person Bart sees wen he is being rescued down the well.  Homer pushes Sting away from Bart and greets him.

questions.text: When Bart and Lisa take career tests at school, Lisa's results say she'll be a homemaker, but Bart's say that he will become what?
questions.explanation:
police officer.

	Oddly, he is said to become a police officer.  He soon becomes hall monitor of the school and has to give up the position after covering for a bad thing Lisa does.

questions.text: In "The Otto Show", Bart sees which band in a live concert?
questions.explanation:
Spinal Tap.

	The band only stays on stage for about 10 minutes as the stage is full of water, one of the members goes blind, and a giant inflatable devil has a hole in it.  A riot ensues at the arena.
